metadata.title: CVE-2019-6471 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition which may occur when discarding malformed packets canresult in BIND exiting due to a REQUIRE assertion failure in dispatch.c.Versions affected: BIND 9.11.0 -> 9.11.7, 9.12.0 -> 9.12.4-P1, 9.14.0 ->9.14.2. Also all releases of the BIND 9.13 development branch and version9.15.0 of the BIND 9.15 development branch and BIND Supported PreviewEdition versions 9.11.3-S1 -> 9.11.7-S1.

criterions.comment: bind9: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
